actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to reduce certain eligibility requirements for basic and supplemental educational opportunity grants.

summary.text: Education Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to: (1) extend eligibility from four to eight years for undergraduate basic and supplemental educational opportunity grants; (2) repeal the provision prohibiting supplemental grants of less than $200 from being awarded; and (3) remove the provision that students receiving such grants be at least half-time students.

titles.title: A bill to reduce certain eligibility requirements for basic and supplemental educational opportunity grants.
